snippet.title: KCCh 2010 Trailer
snippet.description:
(Minon speaking):  So, this is more of a progress report.  My computer was being oddly disobedient, thus some oddly slow or laggy frames in the video.

(Kirbster speaking): This took  quite a lot of programming effort on Minon's part (and a good deal of modelling/animating/etc. assistance from the rest of us) but I think the project really advanced a ton because of it. We really wanted to get this together before Nintendo's conference tomorrow...err...later today, mostly in case they actually reveal a new Kirby game(which I somewhat hope yet mostly doubt they will). We don't want to steal their thunder if they were to, of course (not that that's really even possible), as wanting a new multiplayer 2.5D Kirby game in the vein of KSS but with new features and more characters and such is the main reason we started this project in the first place. But we did want to leave a mark of how far we've come in these 4 years, even with all the bumps and recodes.
We hope you enjoy the trailer, and you can look forward to a new demo with the features in it and more sometime in the next few months.
